prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a sleek body and vibrant green scales.
Show me a unique Pokemon that has sharp fins and a dynamic swimming style.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in urban waters with a playful personality.
Design a Pokemon with a striking color pattern and excellent speed in battle.
Generate a Pokemon that resembles a fish but has unique features like spikes.
Make a creature that can blend into its aquatic environment with camouflage abilities.
I want a Pokemon that can rapidly evolve in response to its environment.
